title: What is the role of women in Kundalini Yoga and Eastern spiritual traditions?
first_phrase: In this text, the author discusses the essence of Yoga and its connection to the Kundalini energy, also known as the power of the serpent. He emphasizes the importance of balancing the feminine and masculine principles represented by Shakti and Shiva, respectively. However, he points out that women lack the complementary principle necessary for this balance, limiting their potential for spiritual transcendence. The author suggests that certain types of women can use sexual magic to access supernatural forces, although this is incredibly dangerous. This last part explores the role of women in ancient Dionysian and tantric orgiastic practices.
